summary: A Gothic styled version of the Bloodskal Sword from Dragonborn
descriptionHtml:
This is my very first retexture using the textures shipped with Skyrim. I just learned how to locate the hidden files.

When I got the Bloodskal I was a little upset at it\'s pink hue, I mean come on. BLOODSKAL not Pinkskal so after googling how to find the textures and a few hours of work this is the end result. I do hope everyone enjoys the hard work I put into this.

Use the NMM

or

Manual: Simply drop the meshes and textures into your data folder


*Please do not repost this texture.
author: Zazil
